QuestData.Title: The Path of War
QuestData.Description: I see you want to save your friend. I can help you, if you will help me.$B$BFirst of all, it should be obvious that the fewer the Slingtail roaming around, the easier it will be to escape.$B$BKill the hozen guards around us, and we will be one step closer to freedom.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Slingtail Treeleapers or Slingtail Mudseers.
QuestData.RewardText: Ahahaha! You are brave.$B$BAn admirable trait.
